name: CUBETASTIC (Python Games)
description:
Thank you for checking out the Beta build of CUBETASTIC. A single player 3D platformer-like game. The player controls a cube through various obstacles to reach the finish. The difficulty and length increases with each level as well as new functionality. It is a straight throw game, which means level progress does not save.

There are still many changes that will be coming to the game but would love to hear any feedback you would be willing to share. 

**IMPORTANT NOTES**

  • This game is still in Beta and nothing is final. 
  • Level progress does not save.

If you encounter any issues/bugs please email natebdolor@gmail.com, or leave a comment below.
